titleStmt.title: To the King both Houses of Parliament friends remember, you must all come to judgement for the one everlasting judge from whom there is no appeal to any other : who is no respecter of persons, he is the one judge of the conscience.
titleStmt.author: Livingstone, Patrick, 1634?-1694.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: London the 8th of the 9th month, 1670.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
